about_the_game:
The first free Steel Division 2 DLC is out now


Two Brand-New Divisions, new Units and 2 new Aces join the Eastern Front in the first Free DLC for Steel Division 2! Part of our 10 Free DLC program, this first pack also features a brand-new map and two new epic music tracks! Have fun!

Two divisions for more tactical possibilities


Build and customize brand-new battlegroups with two additional (and harsh enemies) divisions: the German 25. Panzergrenadier Division and the 84th Guards Rifle Division!

One new battlefield for skirmish battles

Fight intense battles in this new skimish map, playable in solo, coop and multiplayer! Featuring central natural water reservoirs, Siedlce offers a unique tactical challenge for the best commanders!

New gorgeous units available for skirmish

New Divisions means new deadly weapons to bring to the battle, including the gargantuous K532 220mm Heavy Field Gun and the KV-8 Heavy Flamethrower Tank!

Two new aces to field on the battlefield


Lead two of the deadliest warriors of the Eastern Front: Helmuth Harth from the 20. Panzerdivision with his Panzer IV H, and Nikolay Stepanovich Averin from the 3rd Guards Mechanized Corps and his SU-76M!

New music tracks


Let's bring more epicness to your epic battles! Lead your new divisions and units on the battlefield to the sound of two brand-new awesome tunes!

legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: Steel Division 2 - Reinforcement Pack #1  - 2 divisions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G4920 (Legacy: i3-2100) , AMD Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 (Legacy: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450), AMD Radeon RX 460 (Legacy: ATI Radeon HD 5570)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: 4 cores Intel | AMD CPU (Intel i3-8100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3 GB (Legacy: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780), AMD Radeon RX 580 (Legacy: AMD Radeon R9 290X)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Two Brand-New Divisions, new Units and 2 new Aces join the Eastern Front in the first Free DLC for Steel Division 2! Part of our 10 Free DLC program, this first pack also features a brand-new map and two new epic music tracks!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
